comments:
I got an assertion failed trying to rename a field.
This error occurs before any window opens.

I succesfully reproduced the bug on two different machines
with different workspaces. The two machines were running M3.

To reproduce it, you can get the org.eclipse.core.runtime (v20021122 
from head) project and try to rename any field from the PluginStats class.

Here is the stack trace.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Nov 22, 2002 11:30:41.969
!MESSAGE Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
